rows.label: qev042101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, Nalu, this is it. End of the road.
It was pretty good life while it lasted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Nalu will miss this big, beautiful world!
So long, Mira! Farewell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask why Nalu is lamenting her fate.

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0020
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Nalu if she is rehearsing lines for a play.

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Tale of Nalu is a sad one, friend.
Nalu is being threatened by nasty Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0004
rows.name:
They are going to kill every last Nopon in caravan
unless Nalu bring them supplies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0005
rows.name:
They want six deflection shield mirrors, three multi-
mirror solar drones, and five mk. IX hypercoolers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0006
rows.name: But it impossible for Nalu to get them all herself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0007
rows.name: This is no play! This is matter of life and death![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0008
rows.name: Nasty Ganglion are threatening to attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0009
rows.name:
They are going to kill every last Nopon in caravan
unless Nalu bring them supplies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0010
rows.name:
They want six deflection shield mirrors, three multi-
mirror solar drones, and five mk. IX hypercoolers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0011
rows.name: But it impossible for Nalu to get them all herself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0030
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Nalu why it's impossible.

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0040
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Nalu that she'll have to figure something out.

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0012
rows.name:
They are all found far from here, with many dangers
along the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0013
rows.name: Poor Nalu would die before locating them all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Besides, all three types of items apparently come from
wreckage of human vehicles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0015
rows.name:
So it make sense for human friends to help. And Nalu
hear that humans are all extremely kind and generous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0016
rows.name:
With six deflection shield mirrors, three multi-mirror
solar drones, and five mk. IX hypercoolers, Nalu
and friendpons will all live to see another day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0017
rows.name: Please, friend! Help caravan of Nalu survive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0018
rows.name:
They are all found far from here, with many dangers
along the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0019
rows.name: Poor Nalu would die before locating them all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Besides, all three types of items apparently come from
wreckage of human vehicles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0021
rows.name:
So it make sense for human friends to help. And Nalu
hear that humans are all extremely kind and generous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0022
rows.name:
With six deflection shield mirrors, three multi-mirror
solar drones, and five mk. IX hypercoolers, Nalu
and friendpons will all live to see another day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0023
rows.name: Please, friend! Help caravan of Nalu survive![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh, thank you! Friend is hero to Nopon everywhere![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0025
rows.name: Nalu have faith friend will succeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Nalu need friend to find deflection shield mirrors,
multi-mirror solar drones, and mk. IX hypercoolers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Without them, only death and despair awaits caravan
of Nalu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0106
rows.name: Welcome back! Has friend found what Nalu asked for?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0028
rows.name: ...Friend is most merciful to have collected them all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0029
rows.name: Nalu and the other Nopon are saved![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0030
rows.name:
The caravan will never forget heroism of friend.
It will live on as Nopon legend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0031
rows.name: Nalu go tell everyone now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Thank you so much. Nalu grateful from bottom of
fuzzy heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0033
rows.name: Baaah ha ha ha ha! Humans are so EASY![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0034
rows.name: Tell them sob story, and they bring whatever is asked![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0035
rows.name:
Nasty Ganglion paid out nose for that stuff!
Aaaah ha ha! Nalu laughing all the way to bank![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0036
rows.name: ...EEEEP! F-friend didn't hear all that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0050
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Nalu that you heard everything. ...EVERYTHING.

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0060
rows.name: Lie

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that you heard nothing.

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0037
rows.name: E-everything...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0038
rows.name:
W-well, what friend just heard were terrible things Nalu
had to say to please Ganglion when Nalu gave them
what they demanded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0039
rows.name:
Guilt and shame from saying it still haunting.
Nalu just reliving it now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0040
rows.name:
They bought—errr, took the things friend was so kind
to gather for Nalu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0041
rows.name:
Nalu barely managed to escape with life, but now
Ganglion scum threaten the caravan again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0042
rows.name: They demand more human things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0043
rows.name: This time it is truly hopeless...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0044
rows.name: Oh, whew! That was close one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0045
rows.name:
Er, but never mind all that.
Nasty Ganglion are threatening to attack again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0046
rows.name: They demand more human things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0047
rows.name: This time it is truly hopeless...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0048
rows.name: It tear Nalu up inside to ask friend for this, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0049
rows.name:
will friend bring more human things to save the
caravan from horrible fate?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0050
rows.name:
If not, nasty Ganglion will tear every Nopon limb
from limb.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0070
rows.name: Offer

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0071
rows.name:
Say you'll stand with Nalu to end
the Ganglion's wicked ways.

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0080
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0081
rows.name:
Tell Nalu that her caravan should
flee the Ganglion's tyranny.

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0051
rows.name:
Nopon not have power to fight back. That is why
Nalu forced to bring them tribute like this. So please!
Friend must help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0052
rows.name:
They are nasty, spiteful monsters. They would chase
Nalu and others to the end of Mira. So please!
Friend must help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0053
rows.name:
Pleaseohpleaseohpleeeeeeease!
Friend is one and only hope of Nalu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0090
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0091
rows.name: Agree to gather the required items once again.

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0100
rows.name: Consider

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0101
rows.name: Investigate Nalu and make sure this is all aboveboard.

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0054
rows.name:
Friend will actually do it?
Could a person BE more gullible?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0055
rows.name:
*AHEM!* No, no, no! Whatever friend just heard was
actually misheard by friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0056
rows.name:
But thank you! Heart of Nalu is bursting with
appreciationess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0057
rows.name:
What Nalu need in order to save caravan this time is
one A-HAB autonomous AI unit and eight Nostalgia
L-002 units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0058
rows.name: One million thanks, friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0059
rows.name:
Why is friend thinking? There is nothing to think about.
Friend will not let entire caravan be killed, will [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0060
rows.name:
For sake of entire caravan, please go find one A-HAB
Autonomous AI unit and eight Nostalgia L-002 units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0061
rows.name: Nalu will await friend here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0062
rows.name:
Nalu need A-HAB autonomous AI unit and eight
Nostalgia L-002 units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0063
rows.name: Many thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0104
rows.name:
Well? Has friend found the items Nalu humbly
requested?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0064
rows.name: Yesss! These will make Nalu rich![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0065
rows.name:
Heh heh heh... Nalu bet she can squeeze even more
money out of this human...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0066
rows.name:
Humans are like money-making machines.
Just turn crank and credits come flooding out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0067
rows.name:
Gah! Did... Er, was Nalu talking out loud just now?
It must be stress from constant threat of violence...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0068
rows.name:
Nalu start speaking in tongues from the trauma.
Just random syllables. No meaning at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0069
rows.name: Anyway, thanks. Um, for these.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0087
rows.name: At this rate, nasty Ganglion will kill everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0088
rows.name: Friend must bring the items Nalu asked for![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0105
rows.name:
Friend returned to us! And did friend find what Nalu
asked for?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0070
rows.name: Friend actually brought them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0071
rows.name:
Friend has to be the dumbe—errr, KINDest person in all
Mira! Ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0072
rows.name:
Friend has saved our lives once again.
Thank you sooo much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0073
rows.name:
It must have been so very hard to find these.
Thank you one bazillion times![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0074
rows.name:
Nalu SO grateful. Overwhelmed by gratefulness, really.
Just big ball of thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0120
rows.name: Blush

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0121
rows.name: Let yourself be moved by Nalu's appreciation.

rows.label: qev042101_JNK0130
rows.name: Suspect

rows.label: qev042101_SEL0131
rows.name: Question Nalu's obviously forced thanks.

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0075
rows.name: Bah ha ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0076
rows.name:
Put on ridiculous show of thanking them,
and humans get all choked up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0077
rows.name: So easy! It is almost boring![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0078
rows.name: ...Er, Nalu said that out loud again, didn't she?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0079
rows.name:
Nalu so awash with appreciation that strange sobbing
noises which only coincidentally sound like words are
coming from mouth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0080
rows.name:
Anyway, Nalu will never, ever forget this kindness!
[ST:playername ] is savior of Nalu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0081
rows.name: Not forced! Nalu thanking friend from depths of heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0082
rows.name: Wait, has friend realized this is all scam?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0083
rows.name:
Er, not scam! Um...damn! Damn fine work by friend!
...Is what this is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0084
rows.name: H-have long, deep look into eyes of Nalu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0085
rows.name:
Not single hint of deception in these beautiful,
dewy orbs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042101_MSG0086
rows.name: In any case, thanks![ST:wait ]
